column1: Mauhúr was sent to reinforce [[Uglúk]]'s troop as they returned to [[Isengard]] with [[Meriadoc Brandybuck
column3: Pippin]]. He found them surrounded by [[Éomer]]'s [[Rohirrim]] at the edge of [[Fangorn Forest]], from which he led his Orcs in an attack. This attack was a failure: the Rohirrim were able to defeat the Orcs, even with Mauhúr's reinforcements.<ref>{{TT
column4: III3}}</ref> Though Mauhúr's own fate is not known with certainty, it seems that he fell with his soldiers at the hands of the Rohirrim.

column1: [[File:The Lord of the Rings - The Two Towers - Mauhúr.jpg
column5: Mauhúr in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'']]

column1: :Mauhúr can be played as Unique Leader, and his home site is Dol Guldur.
'''2002: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'':'''
:Mauhúr is portrayed as an [[Uruk-hai]] instead of an Orc, and is played by [[Robbie Magasiva]] and voice [[Andy Serkis]]. He was the commander after [[Lurtz]]'s death.
[[Category:Characters in The Lord of the Rings]]
